thread.title: Hidden gem in Soho
thread.title_full: Hidden gem in Soho - Review of The Nadler Soho, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Petra M
title: Hidden gem in Soho
text:
Nice hotel slightly hidden in the end Carlisle Street. Small room, but clean and nicely decorated, spotless bathroom. Kitchenette in the room. No restaurant at hotel, but breakfast can be ordered in room. Very friendly and helpful staff.
Room Tip: Staying more than 1-2 nights book a larger room to have soem extra space See more room tips
